amendment.description: Amendment sought to delay implementation of the act until it is determined that it will not have a negative impact on the quantity, quality, and safety of drinking water in the California Delta region.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 113-340 to delay implementation of the act until it is determined that it will not have a negative impact on the quantity, quality, and safety of drinking water in the California Delta region.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bera amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 194 - 226 (Roll no. 44).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Bera amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 194 - 226 (Roll no. 44).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Bera.
